direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve order creation using smart order routing (SOR) but differ in whether the order is actually sent to the matching engine.
Both methods validate new order creation without sending the order to the matching engine, sharing similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods handle new order creation, but testSorOrder validates the order without sending it, while newOrder sends the order to the matching engine.
Both methods handle order-related operations and may encounter similar exceptions related to order validation and processing.
Both methods access order-related data and resources, albeit for different purposes (creation vs. retrieval).

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require URL parser initialization.
Environment setup is required before validating URLs.
Both methods verify URL formats and handle similar exceptions.
